attributes.action: Threaten, and if necessary use force against Iran if the kidnapped UK troops aren't released
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iran has committed an act of war, Britain should not show weakens and if a diplomatic solution isn't found very quickly, the UK should use all necessary force against Iran to free the captured UK troops

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
